entries.journal_entry_description: After relating his story, Doctor Kinesworthy agreed to continue his work in cybernetics to help with Myyydril people. His equipment was last seen at an Imperial camp which had been attacked long ago. It is your task to find the camp and help recover Kinesworthy's equipment.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Retrieve the officer's log, then head to the abandoned Imperial camp and search the boxes there. The Imperial camp can be found in the Dead Forest where the Sayormi live.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: "Our encampment can be found at the end of the river in the Southwest portion of the forest. We've hidden the boxes and equipment that were found at a destroyed Imperial camp here. They'll be safe until our pickup arrives." -- Officer's Log
